custom1.description:
This is the color to replace in white label products. 
Ensure luminousity of custom color = 46.8 (see hsluv.org). 
AAA against FFFFFF bg.

custom2.description: This is the color to replace in white label products. Ensure luminousity of custom color is >=52.1 (see hsluv.org) to be AAA text on 000000 bgs.

moderate.description: was 0.5. Increased to 0.55 so that we can use this for hint text etc too, and still be accessible.
